Key.Japanese: ヘルファイア モードを設定

Key.English: Semi-active laser homing missile with high explosive anti-tank warhead
Key.Spanish: Misil de guiado láser semi-activo con cabeza de alto explosivo anti-tanque

Key.English: Millimeter-wave radar guided missile with high explosive anti-tank warhead
Key.Spanish: Misil guiado por radar de onda milimétrica con cabeza de alto explosivo anti-tanque

Key.English: Semi-active laser homing missile with metal augmented charge anti-personnel warhead
Key.Spanish: Misil guiado por láser semi-activo con cabeza de carga de metal aumentada anti-persona
